text: My go-to for everything that I need. Danny and the friendly lady at the store are super friendly and just cheer you up. Shopping becomes a pleasure when you go there. I wholeheartedly recommend The Costa Choice for daily essentials for breakfast and snacks and the best collection of beverages as well.

Small store but very conveniently packed with a large assortment of daily essentials - groceries, milk, ice creams, beer and wine and lot of Indian delicacies and essentials. Staff is super friendly and helpful.
